review: This works wonderfully.  I had a Roku stick and it would have trouble staying connected to wifi.  The Fire TV Stick stays connected with strong signal.  It's user interface is also much quicker than the Roku.  The screen responds to the remote control instantly unlike the Roku which had a slight but detectable lag.  This also comes with the HDMI extension cable.  I have 3 TVs and all require the use of an extension cable due to the placement of the HDMI ports.  I would imagine I'm not alone in this and Roku's choice to not include one is puzzling.  So in summary, as compared to the Roku, it's $10 cheaper, performs better, and includes everything you need in the box.  There's no downside...get this!
author: MJP
